justification: The fields id, name, taskType, workflowInstanceId/processInstanceId, taskCode, taskDefinitionVersion, state, firstSubmitTime, submitTime, startTime, endTime, host, executePath, logPath, retryTimes, alertFlag, pid, appLink, flag, duration, maxRetryTimes, retryInterval, taskInstancePriority, workerGroup, environmentCode, environmentConfig, executorId, varPool, executorName, delayTime, taskParams, dryRun, taskGroupId, cpuQuota, memoryMax, taskExecuteType appear in multiple classes (TaskInstance and TaskInstanceExecuteDto) indicating a high frequency of occurrence which leads to code duplication and a higher chance of bugs when making changes.
